nodes.text: Trade Route X143 was a trade route in the Corellian system. CorSec regularly sent patrols along the route to combat pirate activities.

1.5 years ABY a CorSec pilot recruit was attacked by three Black Sun starfighters while on patrol on this trade route. He managed to destroy the ships and CorSec Sergeant Rhea immediately ordered an attack on other Black Sun ships spotted in the system.

The name of this trade route is mentioned in the first mission given out by CorSec pilot trainer Sergeant Rhea in Star Wars Galaxies. In this mission, the player has to fly to several waypoints in the Corellian system and then destroy three attacking Black Sun ships to complete the mission.
